name: Yuto's Journal - SoSFoMT fan game (Download)
description:
This is a visual novel based on Story of Seasons: Friends of Mineral Town. It uses assets and dialog from the game, as well as original content.
The story details Yuto's experiences moving to Mineral Town, making friends, and of course, falling in love.

Please be advised: There is adult content, but it can be skipped. When presented with a choice, the first option will bypass anything not safe for work. There are still some mentions of sexual themes in the main script, though.

(This download version is the better way to play, but there's a mirror here that can be run in browser. It's quite laggy and pixelated, but I'm unfortunately not good enough at coding to optimize that

https://silverxsmith.itch.io/yutos-journal)
